version_description:
- enhanced search finds many more results
- history can now be edited
- enhanced online/offline mode

- Support for iOS 8, iPhone 6 and 64 bit
- Bugfixes

With iOS 9 Linguee is so well integrated into your system that you can easily look up words from any other app.
- Slide Over and Split View on iPad: Open Linguee alongside of your favorite app. To see translations, all you need to do is copy the word you are looking for.
- Share in context menu: You can look up a word you select in any other app on Linguee by selecting "share" in the context menu.
- System-wide search: Using Spotlight to search for content will now also include results from Linguee.

- Toggle button for online and/or offline mode
- Several improvements and fixed issues

- Bug fixes
- Settings displayed via pop-up menu.
New improved offline mode and bug fixes

+ Optimization and several bug fixes
+ Examples for individual results now displayed properly in online mode even with offline dictionaries installed
+ Preferred keyboard configuration saved based on selected dictionary
+ Display order of offline dictionaries improved
